1.content:
We'll start off with the land you're starting in.
          Arcus is a classic kingdom, with kings, knights, and dragons around, the king however is corrupt and it's up to you to either join him or stop him

         Leviathan is a much different world, a younger one as well. An entire ocean had apparently been dried by a great leader about a year before the story began, full of uncharted caves and unsealed demons. Good luck.

         Al' Kashin is a mystical and desert land similar to ancient Arabia. With unexplored ruins, hidden genies, mysterious flames, and whatever else you think could be there.

Or make you dreamworld from your imagination.
1.title: The Beggining

info.brief_description: You wake up to find a world were everyone controls magic related to the elements.
info.description:
You wake up and find that you can control magic related to an element. Whats more is that you discover that the entire world has changed so that everyone has the ability naturally. You decide to set off on an adventure to discover why this happened.
You may only have one magic.
You may not die or kill a main character.
Keep it E rated.
Correct spelling please.

Good luck.
